player.name: Larry Bird
player.physicalDescription: tall 6'9" forward, not traditionally athletic, blonde hair with mustache, pale white skin, blue eyes, confident smirk, deceptive appearance hiding killer instinct
player.archetype: The Trash Talker, strategic genius, would do anything to win

figure.name: Jacob
figure.attributeDescription: shepherd's staff, surrounded by spotted and speckled sheep and goats representing his clever dealings with Laban
figure.visualStyle: cunning patriarch, the supplanter who became Israel
figure.clothing: wealthy patriarch's robes, layered fine fabrics, the dress of a successful man who earned it through wit
figure.physicalDescription: smooth-skinned man (contrast to hairy Esau), intelligent scheming eyes, neat beard, calculating expression, olive skin, always thinking three moves ahead
figure.archetype: The Supplanter, wrestled God, outsmarted everyone on his path to greatness

connection.thematic: Both were strategic geniuses who used their minds to overcome more athletic opponents
connection.narrative: Jacob wrestled an angel and won. Bird wrestled with legends and talked trash the whole time. Cerebral assassins.
connection.relationship: Clever competitors who outthought everyone else

interactions.description: Two strategic minds, already planning their next move
Mutual respect between those who win with their minds
